book.synopsis: In this incredibly timely book,renowned economist Stephen Leeb shows how surging oilprices will contribute to a huge economic collapse bysoaring to over $100, and perhaps $200, a barrel- andtells how you can avoid the pitfalls of the upcomingcrisis.
book.title_long: The Coming Economic Collapse: How You Can Thrive When Oil Costs $200 a Barrel
book.dimensions: Height: 9.325 Inches, Length: 6.25 Inches, Weight: 0.9 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
